rdf:Description.dc:title: Water management in Alberta : challenges for the future : discussion draft of legislation 1994 challenges for the future : discussion draft of legislation.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Environmental Protection.
Alberta. Natural Resources Conservation Board.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Also referred to as: Water management policy and legislation review : discussion draft.
The Discussion Draft provides suggested wording for Alberta's proposed water conservation and management legislation.

Alberta Government Library*NRCB Exhibit donated by NRCB. Further uncatalogued and noncirculating Exhibit items found in TC 426.5 A3 W74 Box 1 and TC 426.5 A3 W74 Box 2. Box 1 contains Exhibit 1-16, 18-21, 23-34, 36, 38, 41-45, 48-53. Box 2 contains Exhibit 54, 57-64, 66-67, 69, 72, 75-77, 79-80, 85-90, 92-95, 97, 100-6, 108, 110-14, 116-19, 122-25, 131-36, 139-41, 143-44, 146-48.
AB Resource Development Edmonton and Red Deer College: lack 3 factsheets.
